Prompts.ResponseQualityDirective: Quality directive: Every link must be actionable, non-duplicative, and data-aware. Titles should be 7–14 words and include a verb plus a named entity or institution. Summaries must include a metric, timeframe, or named dataset and a clear decision verb. Route slugs must be 24–72 characters, have ≥ 3 hyphen tokens, and encode region/sector or entity + method/instrument/institution + timeframe/dataset (ASCII a–z, 0–9, hyphens). Ban generic slugs like "/legal-issues", "/policy", "/ukraine-war-legal-issues". Ensure coverage diversity across links: at least one legal-framework explainer, one dataset/benchmark comparison, one compliance/playbook, one risk/timeline tracker, and one stakeholder/oversight angle. Article must include at least one internal link with a descriptive anchor (≥ 6 words, with timeframe or dataset). No external URLs in routes; external sources allowed only inside articleHtml <a>.
